verbose_text: qPCR revealed that the expression of the GATA4 downstream target gene, alpha-MHC, in the heart tissues of the homozygous mice was lower than that in the heart tiussues of the wild-type control mice (P < 0.05), suggesting that the introduction of GATA4 M310V inhibits the normal expression of this downstream gene.
evidence: expression of the GATA4 downstream target gene, alpha-MHC
